question: Replace all 0's with 5
description: You are given an integer N. You need to convert all zeroes of N to 5.

examples.explaination: There are two zeroes in 1004 on replacing all zeroes with "5", the new number will be "1554".
Since there are no zeroes in "121", the number remains as "121".
